caption.title: Comparison of prior and posterior probability distribution estimates for the age of ancient HBV samples NASD24SEQ and JN315779.
caption.p: Histogram showing the probability density estimation distributions for the Bayesian analysis of NASD24SEQ and JN315779 both with and without sequence data from subset a-ii, using a normal prior approximating the radiocarbon dates for the samples and with the internal calibration scheme using the estimation of entry into the Americas from Llamas et al. 2016 [ 55] to calibrate the node separating genotypes F and H.
